00064 /* defined in pipeline.c, is hardcopy of active dynamic allocated Render */
00065 /* only to be used here in this file, it's for speed */
00066 extern struct Render R;

00069 /* Shade Sample order:
00070  *
00071  * - shade_samples_fill_with_ps()
00072  *     - for each sample
00073  *         - shade_input_set_triangle()  <- if prev sample-face is same, use shade_input_copy_triangle()
00074  *         - if vlr
00075  *             - shade_input_set_viewco()    <- not for ray or bake
00076  *             - shade_input_set_uv()        <- not for ray or bake
00077  *             - shade_input_set_normals()
00078  * - shade_samples()
00079  *     - if AO
00080  *         - shade_samples_do_AO()
00081  *     - if shading happens
00082  *         - for each sample
00083  *             - shade_input_set_shade_texco()
00084  *             - shade_samples_do_shade()
00085  * - OSA: distribute sample result with filter masking
00086  *
00087  */
00088 
00089 #define VECADDISFAC(v1,v3,fac)  {   \
00090     *(v1 + 0) += *(v3 + 0) * (fac); \
00091     *(v1 + 1) += *(v3 + 1) * (fac); \
00092     *(v1 + 2) += *(v3 + 2) * (fac); \
00093 }
00094 
00095 /* initialize material variables in shadeinput, 
00096  * doing inverse gamma correction where applicable */
00097 void shade_input_init_material(ShadeInput *shi)
00098 {
00099     /* note, keep this synced with render_types.h */
00100     memcpy(&shi->r, &shi->mat->r, 23*sizeof(float));
00101     shi->har= shi->mat->har;
00102 }
00103 
00104 /* also used as callback for nodes */
00105 /* delivers a fully filled in ShadeResult, for all passes */
00106 void shade_material_loop(ShadeInput *shi, ShadeResult *shr)
00107 {
00108 
00109     shade_lamp_loop(shi, shr);  /* clears shr */
00110     
00111     if (shi->translucency!=0.0f) {
00112         ShadeResult shr_t;
00113         float fac= shi->translucency;
00114         
00115         shade_input_init_material(shi);
00116         negate_v3_v3(shi->vn, shi->vno);
00117         negate_v3(shi->facenor);
00118         shi->depth++;   /* hack to get real shadow now */
00119         shade_lamp_loop(shi, &shr_t);
00120         shi->depth--;
00121 
00122         /* a couple of passes */
00123         VECADDISFAC(shr->combined, shr_t.combined, fac);
00124         if (shi->passflag & SCE_PASS_SPEC)
00125             VECADDISFAC(shr->spec, shr_t.spec, fac);
00126         if (shi->passflag & SCE_PASS_DIFFUSE)
00127             VECADDISFAC(shr->diff, shr_t.diff, fac);
00128         if (shi->passflag & SCE_PASS_SHADOW)
00129             VECADDISFAC(shr->shad, shr_t.shad, fac);
00130 
00131         negate_v3(shi->vn);
00132         negate_v3(shi->facenor);
00133     }
00134     
00135     /* depth >= 1 when ray-shading */
00136     if (shi->depth==0 || shi->volume_depth > 0) {
00137         if (R.r.mode & R_RAYTRACE) {
00138             if (shi->ray_mirror!=0.0f || ((shi->mode & MA_TRANSP) && (shi->mode & MA_RAYTRANSP) && shr->alpha!=1.0f)) {
00139                 /* ray trace works on combined, but gives pass info */
00140                 ray_trace(shi, shr);
00141             }
00142         }
00143         /* disable adding of sky for raytransp */
00144         if ((shi->mode & MA_TRANSP) && (shi->mode & MA_RAYTRANSP))
00145             if ((shi->layflag & SCE_LAY_SKY) && (R.r.alphamode==R_ADDSKY))
00146                 shr->alpha= 1.0f;
00147     }
00148     
00149     if (R.r.mode & R_RAYTRACE) {
00150         if (R.render_volumes_inside.first)
00151             shade_volume_inside(shi, shr);
00152     }
00153 }
00154

00156 /* do a shade, finish up some passes, apply mist */
00157 void shade_input_do_shade(ShadeInput *shi, ShadeResult *shr)
00158 {
00159     float alpha;
00160     
00161     /* ------  main shading loop -------- */
00162 #ifdef RE_RAYCOUNTER
00163     memset(&shi->raycounter, 0, sizeof(shi->raycounter));
00164 #endif
00165     
00166     if (shi->mat->nodetree && shi->mat->use_nodes) {
00167         ntreeShaderExecTree(shi->mat->nodetree, shi, shr);
00168     }
00169     else {
00170         /* copy all relevant material vars, note, keep this synced with render_types.h */
00171         shade_input_init_material(shi);
00172         
00173         if (shi->mat->material_type == MA_TYPE_VOLUME) {
00174             if (R.r.mode & R_RAYTRACE) {
00175                 shade_volume_outside(shi, shr);
00176             }
00177         }
00178         else { /* MA_TYPE_SURFACE, MA_TYPE_WIRE */
00179             shade_material_loop(shi, shr);
00180         }
00181     }
00182     
00183     /* copy additional passes */
00184     if (shi->passflag & (SCE_PASS_VECTOR|SCE_PASS_NORMAL)) {
00185         copy_v4_v4(shr->winspeed, shi->winspeed);
00186         copy_v3_v3(shr->nor, shi->vn);
00187     }
00188     
00189     /* MIST */
00190     if ((shi->passflag & SCE_PASS_MIST) || ((R.wrld.mode & WO_MIST) && (shi->mat->mode & MA_NOMIST)==0)) {
00191         if (R.r.mode & R_ORTHO)
00192             shr->mist= mistfactor(-shi->co[2], shi->co);
00193         else
00194             shr->mist= mistfactor(len_v3(shi->co), shi->co);
00195     }
00196     else shr->mist= 0.0f;
00197     
00198     if ((R.wrld.mode & WO_MIST) && (shi->mat->mode & MA_NOMIST)==0 ) {
00199         alpha= shr->mist;
00200     }
00201     else alpha= 1.0f;
00202     
00203     /* add mist and premul color */
00204     if (shr->alpha!=1.0f || alpha!=1.0f) {
00205         float fac= alpha*(shr->alpha);
00206         shr->combined[3]= fac;
00207         
00208         if (shi->mat->material_type!= MA_TYPE_VOLUME)
00209             mul_v3_fl(shr->combined, fac);
00210     }
00211     else
00212         shr->combined[3]= 1.0f;
00213     
00214     /* add z */
00215     shr->z= -shi->co[2];
00216     
00217     /* RAYHITS */
00218 #if 0
00219     if (1 || shi->passflag & SCE_PASS_RAYHITS) {
00220         shr->rayhits[0] = (float)shi->raycounter.faces.test;
00221         shr->rayhits[1] = (float)shi->raycounter.bb.hit;
00222         shr->rayhits[2] = 0.0;
00223         shr->rayhits[3] = 1.0;
00224     }
00225 #endif
00226 
00227     RE_RC_MERGE(&re_rc_counter[shi->thread], &shi->raycounter);
00228 }

00235 void vlr_set_uv_indices(VlakRen *vlr, int *i1, int *i2, int *i3)
00236 {
00237     /* to prevent storing new tfaces or vcols, we check a split runtime */
00238     /*      4---3       4---3 */
00239     /*      |\ 1|   or  |1 /| */
00240     /*      |0\ |       |/ 0| */
00241     /*      1---2       1---2   0 = orig face, 1 = new face */
00242     
00243     /* Update vert nums to point to correct verts of original face */
00244     if (vlr->flag & R_DIVIDE_24) {  
00245         if (vlr->flag & R_FACE_SPLIT) {
00246             (*i1)++; (*i2)++; (*i3)++;
00247         }
00248         else {
00249             (*i3)++;
00250         }
00251     }
00252     else if (vlr->flag & R_FACE_SPLIT) {
00253         (*i2)++; (*i3)++; 
00254     }
00255 }
00256 
00257 /* copy data from face to ShadeInput, general case */
00258 /* indices 0 1 2 3 only */
00259 void shade_input_set_triangle_i(ShadeInput *shi, ObjectInstanceRen *obi, VlakRen *vlr, short i1, short i2, short i3)
00260 {
00261     VertRen **vpp= &vlr->v1;
00262     
00263     shi->vlr= vlr;
00264     shi->obi= obi;
00265     shi->obr= obi->obr;
00266 
00267     shi->v1= vpp[i1];
00268     shi->v2= vpp[i2];
00269     shi->v3= vpp[i3];
00270     
00271     shi->i1= i1;
00272     shi->i2= i2;
00273     shi->i3= i3;
00274     
00275     /* note, shi->mat is set in node shaders */
00276     shi->mat= shi->mat_override?shi->mat_override:vlr->mat;
00277     
00278     shi->osatex= (shi->mat->texco & TEXCO_OSA);
00279     shi->mode= shi->mat->mode_l;        /* or-ed result for all nodes */
00280 
00281     /* facenormal copy, can get flipped */
00282     shi->flippednor= 0;
00283     RE_vlakren_get_normal(&R, obi, vlr, shi->facenor);
00284     
00285     /* calculate vertexnormals */
00286     if (vlr->flag & R_SMOOTH) {
00287         copy_v3_v3(shi->n1, shi->v1->n);
00288         copy_v3_v3(shi->n2, shi->v2->n);
00289         copy_v3_v3(shi->n3, shi->v3->n);
00290 
00291         if (obi->flag & R_TRANSFORMED) {
00292             mul_m3_v3(obi->nmat, shi->n1); normalize_v3(shi->n1);
00293             mul_m3_v3(obi->nmat, shi->n2); normalize_v3(shi->n2);
00294             mul_m3_v3(obi->nmat, shi->n3); normalize_v3(shi->n3);
00295         }
00296     }
00297 }

00299 /* note, facenr declared volatile due to over-eager -O2 optimization's
00300  * on cygwin (particularly -frerun-cse-after-loop)
00301  */
00302 
00303 /* copy data from face to ShadeInput, scanline case */
00304 void shade_input_set_triangle(ShadeInput *shi, volatile int obi, volatile int facenr, int UNUSED(normal_flip))
00305 {
00306     if (facenr>0) {
00307         shi->obi= &R.objectinstance[obi];
00308         shi->obr= shi->obi->obr;
00309         shi->facenr= (facenr-1) & RE_QUAD_MASK;
00310         if ( shi->facenr < shi->obr->totvlak ) {
00311             VlakRen *vlr= RE_findOrAddVlak(shi->obr, shi->facenr);
00312             
00313             if (facenr & RE_QUAD_OFFS)
00314                 shade_input_set_triangle_i(shi, shi->obi, vlr, 0, 2, 3);
00315             else
00316                 shade_input_set_triangle_i(shi, shi->obi, vlr, 0, 1, 2);
00317         }
00318         else
00319             shi->vlr= NULL; /* general signal we got sky */
00320     }
00321     else
00322         shi->vlr= NULL; /* general signal we got sky */
00323 }
00324 
00325 /* full osa case: copy static info */
00326 void shade_input_copy_triangle(ShadeInput *shi, ShadeInput *from)
00327 {
00328     /* not so nice, but works... warning is in RE_shader_ext.h */
00329     memcpy(shi, from, sizeof(struct ShadeInputCopy));
00330 }
00331 
00332 /* copy data from strand to shadeinput */
00333 void shade_input_set_strand(ShadeInput *shi, StrandRen *strand, StrandPoint *spoint)
00334 {
00335     /* note, shi->mat is set in node shaders */
00336     shi->mat= shi->mat_override? shi->mat_override: strand->buffer->ma;
00337     
00338     shi->osatex= (shi->mat->texco & TEXCO_OSA);
00339     shi->mode= shi->mat->mode_l;        /* or-ed result for all nodes */
00340 
00341     /* shade_input_set_viewco equivalent */
00342     copy_v3_v3(shi->co, spoint->co);
00343     copy_v3_v3(shi->view, shi->co);
00344     normalize_v3(shi->view);
00345 
00346     shi->xs= (int)spoint->x;
00347     shi->ys= (int)spoint->y;
00348 
00349     if (shi->osatex || (R.r.mode & R_SHADOW)) {
00350         copy_v3_v3(shi->dxco, spoint->dtco);
00351         copy_v3_v3(shi->dyco, spoint->dsco);
00352     }
00353 
00354     /* dxview, dyview, not supported */
00355 
00356     /* facenormal, simply viewco flipped */
00357     copy_v3_v3(shi->facenor, spoint->nor);
00358 
00359     /* shade_input_set_normals equivalent */
00360     if (shi->mat->mode & MA_TANGENT_STR) {
00361         copy_v3_v3(shi->vn, spoint->tan);
00362     }
00363     else {
00364         float cross[3];
00365 
00366         cross_v3_v3v3(cross, spoint->co, spoint->tan);
00367         cross_v3_v3v3(shi->vn, cross, spoint->tan);
00368         normalize_v3(shi->vn);
00369 
00370         if (dot_v3v3(shi->vn, shi->view) < 0.0f)
00371             negate_v3(shi->vn);
00372     }
00373 
00374     copy_v3_v3(shi->vno, shi->vn);
00375 }
00376 
00377 void shade_input_set_strand_texco(ShadeInput *shi, StrandRen *strand, StrandVert *svert, StrandPoint *spoint)
00378 {
00379     StrandBuffer *strandbuf= strand->buffer;
00380     ObjectRen *obr= strandbuf->obr;
00381     StrandVert *sv;
00382     int mode= shi->mode;        /* or-ed result for all nodes */
00383     short texco= shi->mat->texco;
00384 
00385     if ((shi->mat->texco & TEXCO_REFL)) {
00386         /* shi->dxview, shi->dyview, not supported */
00387     }
00388 
00389     if (shi->osatex && (texco & (TEXCO_NORM|TEXCO_REFL))) {
00390         /* not supported */
00391     }
00392 
00393     if (mode & (MA_TANGENT_V|MA_NORMAP_TANG)) {
00394         copy_v3_v3(shi->tang, spoint->tan);
00395         copy_v3_v3(shi->nmaptang, spoint->tan);
00396     }
00397 
00398     if (mode & MA_STR_SURFDIFF) {
00399         float *surfnor= RE_strandren_get_surfnor(obr, strand, 0);
00400 
00401         if (surfnor)
00402             copy_v3_v3(shi->surfnor, surfnor);
00403         else
00404             copy_v3_v3(shi->surfnor, shi->vn);
00405 
00406         if (shi->mat->strand_surfnor > 0.0f) {
00407             shi->surfdist= 0.0f;
00408             for (sv=strand->vert; sv!=svert; sv++)
00409                 shi->surfdist+=len_v3v3(sv->co, (sv+1)->co);
00410             shi->surfdist += spoint->t*len_v3v3(sv->co, (sv+1)->co);
00411         }
00412     }
00413 
00414     if (R.r.mode & R_SPEED) {
00415         float *speed;
00416         
00417         speed= RE_strandren_get_winspeed(shi->obi, strand, 0);
00418         if (speed)
00419             copy_v4_v4(shi->winspeed, speed);
00420         else
00421             shi->winspeed[0]= shi->winspeed[1]= shi->winspeed[2]= shi->winspeed[3]= 0.0f;
00422     }
00423 
00424     /* shade_input_set_shade_texco equivalent */
00425     if (texco & NEED_UV) {
00426         if (texco & TEXCO_ORCO) {
00427             copy_v3_v3(shi->lo, strand->orco);
00428             /* no shi->osatex, orco derivatives are zero */
00429         }
00430 
00431         if (texco & TEXCO_GLOB) {
00432             copy_v3_v3(shi->gl, shi->co);
00433             mul_m4_v3(R.viewinv, shi->gl);
00434             
00435             if (shi->osatex) {
00436                 copy_v3_v3(shi->dxgl, shi->dxco);
00437                 mul_mat3_m4_v3(R.viewinv, shi->dxgl); 
00438                 copy_v3_v3(shi->dygl, shi->dyco);
00439                 mul_mat3_m4_v3(R.viewinv, shi->dygl);
00440             }
00441         }
00442 
00443         if (texco & TEXCO_STRAND) {
00444             shi->strandco= spoint->strandco;
00445 
00446             if (shi->osatex) {
00447                 shi->dxstrand= spoint->dtstrandco;
00448                 shi->dystrand= 0.0f;
00449             }
00450         }
00451 
00452         if ((texco & TEXCO_UV) || (mode & (MA_VERTEXCOL|MA_VERTEXCOLP|MA_FACETEXTURE))) {
00453             MCol *mcol;
00454             float *uv;
00455             char *name;
00456             int i;
00457 
00458             shi->totuv= 0;
00459             shi->totcol= 0;
00460             shi->actuv= obr->actmtface;
00461             shi->actcol= obr->actmcol;
00462 
00463             if (mode & (MA_VERTEXCOL|MA_VERTEXCOLP)) {
00464                 for (i=0; (mcol=RE_strandren_get_mcol(obr, strand, i, &name, 0)); i++) {
00465                     ShadeInputCol *scol= &shi->col[i];
00466                     char *cp= (char*)mcol;
00467                     
00468                     shi->totcol++;
00469                     scol->name= name;
00470 
00471                     scol->col[0]= cp[3]/255.0f;
00472                     scol->col[1]= cp[2]/255.0f;
00473                     scol->col[2]= cp[1]/255.0f;
00474                     scol->col[3]= cp[0]/255.0f;
00475                 }
00476 
00477                 if (shi->totcol) {
00478                     shi->vcol[0]= shi->col[shi->actcol].col[0];
00479                     shi->vcol[1]= shi->col[shi->actcol].col[1];
00480                     shi->vcol[2]= shi->col[shi->actcol].col[2];
00481                     shi->vcol[3]= shi->col[shi->actcol].col[3];
00482                 }
00483                 else {
00484                     shi->vcol[0]= 0.0f;
00485                     shi->vcol[1]= 0.0f;
00486                     shi->vcol[2]= 0.0f;
00487                     shi->vcol[3]= 0.0f;
00488                 }
00489             }
00490 
00491             for (i=0; (uv=RE_strandren_get_uv(obr, strand, i, &name, 0)); i++) {
00492                 ShadeInputUV *suv= &shi->uv[i];
00493 
00494                 shi->totuv++;
00495                 suv->name= name;
00496 
00497                 if (strandbuf->overrideuv == i) {
00498                     suv->uv[0]= -1.0f;
00499                     suv->uv[1]= spoint->strandco;
00500                     suv->uv[2]= 0.0f;
00501                 }
00502                 else {
00503                     suv->uv[0]= -1.0f + 2.0f*uv[0];
00504                     suv->uv[1]= -1.0f + 2.0f*uv[1];
00505                     suv->uv[2]= 0.0f;   /* texture.c assumes there are 3 coords */
00506                 }
00507 
00508                 if (shi->osatex) {
00509                     suv->dxuv[0]= 0.0f;
00510                     suv->dxuv[1]= 0.0f;
00511                     suv->dyuv[0]= 0.0f;
00512                     suv->dyuv[1]= 0.0f;
00513                 }
00514 
00515                 if ((mode & MA_FACETEXTURE) && i==obr->actmtface) {
00516                     if ((mode & (MA_VERTEXCOL|MA_VERTEXCOLP))==0) {
00517                         shi->vcol[0]= 1.0f;
00518                         shi->vcol[1]= 1.0f;
00519                         shi->vcol[2]= 1.0f;
00520                         shi->vcol[3]= 1.0f;
00521                     }
00522                 }
00523             }
00524 
00525             if (shi->totuv == 0) {
00526                 ShadeInputUV *suv= &shi->uv[0];
00527 
00528                 suv->uv[0]= 0.0f;
00529                 suv->uv[1]= spoint->strandco;
00530                 suv->uv[2]= 0.0f;   /* texture.c assumes there are 3 coords */
00531                 
00532                 if (mode & MA_FACETEXTURE) {
00533                     /* no tface? set at 1.0f */
00534                     shi->vcol[0]= 1.0f;
00535                     shi->vcol[1]= 1.0f;
00536                     shi->vcol[2]= 1.0f;
00537                     shi->vcol[3]= 1.0f;
00538                 }
00539             }
00540 
00541         }
00542 
00543         if (texco & TEXCO_NORM) {
00544             shi->orn[0]= -shi->vn[0];
00545             shi->orn[1]= -shi->vn[1];
00546             shi->orn[2]= -shi->vn[2];
00547         }
00548 
00549         if (texco & TEXCO_STRESS) {
00550             /* not supported */
00551         }
00552 
00553         if (texco & TEXCO_TANGENT) {
00554             if ((mode & MA_TANGENT_V)==0) {
00555                 /* just prevent surprises */
00556                 shi->tang[0]= shi->tang[1]= shi->tang[2]= 0.0f;
00557                 shi->nmaptang[0]= shi->nmaptang[1]= shi->nmaptang[2]= 0.0f;
00558             }
00559         }
00560     }
00561 
00562     /* this only avalailable for scanline renders */
00563     if (shi->depth==0) {
00564         if (texco & TEXCO_WINDOW) {
00565             shi->winco[0]= -1.0f + 2.0f*spoint->x/(float)R.winx;
00566             shi->winco[1]= -1.0f + 2.0f*spoint->y/(float)R.winy;
00567             shi->winco[2]= 0.0f;
00568 
00569             /* not supported */
00570             if (shi->osatex) {
00571                 shi->dxwin[0]= 0.0f;
00572                 shi->dywin[1]= 0.0f;
00573                 shi->dxwin[0]= 0.0f;
00574                 shi->dywin[1]= 0.0f;
00575             }
00576         }
00577 
00578         if (texco & TEXCO_STICKY) {
00579             /* not supported */
00580         }
00581     }
00582     
00583     if (shi->do_manage) {
00584         if (mode & (MA_VERTEXCOL|MA_VERTEXCOLP|MA_FACETEXTURE)) {
00585             srgb_to_linearrgb_v3_v3(shi->vcol, shi->vcol);
00586         }
00587     }
00588     
00589 }
00590 
00591 /* from scanline pixel coordinates to 3d coordinates, requires set_triangle */
00592 void shade_input_calc_viewco(ShadeInput *shi, float x, float y, float z, float view[3], float dxyview[2], float co[3], float dxco[3], float dyco[3])
00593 {
00594     /* returns not normalized, so is in viewplane coords */
00595     calc_view_vector(view, x, y);
00596     
00597     if (shi->mat->material_type == MA_TYPE_WIRE) {
00598         /* wire cannot use normal for calculating shi->co, so
00599          * we reconstruct the coordinate less accurate */
00600         if (R.r.mode & R_ORTHO)
00601             calc_renderco_ortho(co, x, y, z);
00602         else
00603             calc_renderco_zbuf(co, view, z);
00604     }
00605     else {
00606         /* for non-wire, intersect with the triangle to get the exact coord */
00607         float fac, dface, v1[3];
00608         
00609         copy_v3_v3(v1, shi->v1->co);
00610         if (shi->obi->flag & R_TRANSFORMED)
00611             mul_m4_v3(shi->obi->mat, v1);
00612         
00613         dface = dot_v3v3(v1, shi->facenor);
00614         
00615         /* ortho viewplane cannot intersect using view vector originating in (0,0,0) */
00616         if (R.r.mode & R_ORTHO) {
00617             /* x and y 3d coordinate can be derived from pixel coord and winmat */
00618             float fx= 2.0f/(R.winx*R.winmat[0][0]);
00619             float fy= 2.0f/(R.winy*R.winmat[1][1]);
00620             
00621             co[0]= (x - 0.5f*R.winx)*fx - R.winmat[3][0]/R.winmat[0][0];
00622             co[1]= (y - 0.5f*R.winy)*fy - R.winmat[3][1]/R.winmat[1][1];
00623             
00624             /* using a*x + b*y + c*z = d equation, (a b c) is normal */
00625             if (shi->facenor[2]!=0.0f)
00626                 co[2]= (dface - shi->facenor[0]*co[0] - shi->facenor[1]*co[1])/shi->facenor[2];
00627             else
00628                 co[2]= 0.0f;
00629             
00630             if (dxco && dyco) {
00631                 dxco[0]= fx;
00632                 dxco[1]= 0.0f;
00633                 if (shi->facenor[2]!=0.0f)
00634                     dxco[2]= -(shi->facenor[0]*fx)/shi->facenor[2];
00635                 else 
00636                     dxco[2]= 0.0f;
00637                 
00638                 dyco[0]= 0.0f;
00639                 dyco[1]= fy;
00640                 if (shi->facenor[2]!=0.0f)
00641                     dyco[2]= -(shi->facenor[1]*fy)/shi->facenor[2];
00642                 else 
00643                     dyco[2]= 0.0f;
00644                 
00645                 if (dxyview) {
00646                     if (co[2]!=0.0f) fac= 1.0f/co[2]; else fac= 0.0f;
00647                     dxyview[0]= -R.viewdx*fac;
00648                     dxyview[1]= -R.viewdy*fac;
00649                 }
00650             }
00651         }
00652         else {
00653             float div;
00654             
00655             div = dot_v3v3(shi->facenor, view);
00656             if (div!=0.0f) fac= dface/div;
00657             else fac= 0.0f;
00658             
00659             co[0]= fac*view[0];
00660             co[1]= fac*view[1];
00661             co[2]= fac*view[2];
00662             
00663             /* pixel dx/dy for render coord */
00664             if (dxco && dyco) {
00665                 float u= dface/(div - R.viewdx*shi->facenor[0]);
00666                 float v= dface/(div - R.viewdy*shi->facenor[1]);
00667                 
00668                 dxco[0]= co[0]- (view[0]-R.viewdx)*u;
00669                 dxco[1]= co[1]- (view[1])*u;
00670                 dxco[2]= co[2]- (view[2])*u;
00671                 
00672                 dyco[0]= co[0]- (view[0])*v;
00673                 dyco[1]= co[1]- (view[1]-R.viewdy)*v;
00674                 dyco[2]= co[2]- (view[2])*v;
00675                 
00676                 if (dxyview) {
00677                     if (fac!=0.0f) fac= 1.0f/fac;
00678                     dxyview[0]= -R.viewdx*fac;
00679                     dxyview[1]= -R.viewdy*fac;
00680                 }
00681             }
00682         }
00683     }
00684     
00685     /* set camera coords - for scanline, it's always 0.0,0.0,0.0 (render is in camera space)
00686      * however for raytrace it can be different - the position of the last intersection */
00687     shi->camera_co[0] = shi->camera_co[1] = shi->camera_co[2] = 0.0f;
00688     
00689     /* cannot normalize earlier, code above needs it at viewplane level */
00690     normalize_v3(view);
00691 }
00692 
00693 /* from scanline pixel coordinates to 3d coordinates, requires set_triangle */
00694 void shade_input_set_viewco(ShadeInput *shi, float x, float y, float xs, float ys, float z)
00695 {
00696     float *dxyview= NULL, *dxco= NULL, *dyco= NULL;
00697     
00698     /* currently in use for dithering (soft shadow), node preview, irregular shad */
00699     shi->xs= (int)xs;
00700     shi->ys= (int)ys;
00701 
00702     /* original scanline coordinate without jitter */
00703     shi->scanco[0]= x;
00704     shi->scanco[1]= y;
00705     shi->scanco[2]= z;
00706 
00707     /* check if we need derivatives */
00708     if (shi->osatex || (R.r.mode & R_SHADOW)) {
00709         dxco= shi->dxco;
00710         dyco= shi->dyco;
00711 
00712         if ((shi->mat->texco & TEXCO_REFL))
00713             dxyview= &shi->dxview;
00714     }
00715 
00716     shade_input_calc_viewco(shi, xs, ys, z, shi->view, dxyview, shi->co, dxco, dyco);
00717 }
00718 
00719 /* calculate U and V, for scanline (silly render face u and v are in range -1 to 0) */
00720 void shade_input_set_uv(ShadeInput *shi)
00721 {
00722     VlakRen *vlr= shi->vlr;
00723     
00724     if ((vlr->flag & R_SMOOTH) || (shi->mat->texco & NEED_UV) || (shi->passflag & SCE_PASS_UV)) {
00725         float v1[3], v2[3], v3[3];
00726 
00727         copy_v3_v3(v1, shi->v1->co);
00728         copy_v3_v3(v2, shi->v2->co);
00729         copy_v3_v3(v3, shi->v3->co);
00730 
00731         if (shi->obi->flag & R_TRANSFORMED) {
00732             mul_m4_v3(shi->obi->mat, v1);
00733             mul_m4_v3(shi->obi->mat, v2);
00734             mul_m4_v3(shi->obi->mat, v3);
00735         }
00736 
00737         /* exception case for wire render of edge */
00738         if (vlr->v2==vlr->v3) {
00739             float lend, lenc;
00740             
00741             lend= len_v3v3(v2, v1);
00742             lenc= len_v3v3(shi->co, v1);
00743             
00744             if (lend==0.0f) {
00745                 shi->u=shi->v= 0.0f;
00746             }
00747             else {
00748                 shi->u= - (1.0f - lenc/lend);
00749                 shi->v= 0.0f;
00750             }
00751             
00752             if (shi->osatex) {
00753                 shi->dx_u=  0.0f;
00754                 shi->dx_v=  0.0f;
00755                 shi->dy_u=  0.0f;
00756                 shi->dy_v=  0.0f;
00757             }
00758         }
00759         else {
00760             /* most of this could become re-used for faces */
00761             float detsh, t00, t10, t01, t11;
00762             int axis1, axis2;
00763 
00764             /* find most stable axis to project */
00765             axis_dominant_v3(&axis1, &axis2, shi->facenor);
00766 
00767             /* compute u,v and derivatives */
00768             t00= v3[axis1]-v1[axis1]; t01= v3[axis2]-v1[axis2];
00769             t10= v3[axis1]-v2[axis1]; t11= v3[axis2]-v2[axis2];
00770 
00771             detsh= (t00*t11-t10*t01);
00772             detsh= (detsh != 0.0f)? 1.0f/detsh: 0.0f;
00773             t00*= detsh; t01*=detsh; 
00774             t10*=detsh; t11*=detsh;
00775 
00776             shi->u= (shi->co[axis1]-v3[axis1])*t11-(shi->co[axis2]-v3[axis2])*t10;
00777             shi->v= (shi->co[axis2]-v3[axis2])*t00-(shi->co[axis1]-v3[axis1])*t01;
00778             if (shi->osatex) {
00779                 shi->dx_u=  shi->dxco[axis1]*t11- shi->dxco[axis2]*t10;
00780                 shi->dx_v=  shi->dxco[axis2]*t00- shi->dxco[axis1]*t01;
00781                 shi->dy_u=  shi->dyco[axis1]*t11- shi->dyco[axis2]*t10;
00782                 shi->dy_v=  shi->dyco[axis2]*t00- shi->dyco[axis1]*t01;
00783             }
00784 
00785             /* u and v are in range -1 to 0, we allow a little bit extra but not too much, screws up speedvectors */
00786             CLAMP(shi->u, -2.0f, 1.0f);
00787             CLAMP(shi->v, -2.0f, 1.0f);
00788         }
00789     }   
00790 }
00791 
00792 void shade_input_set_normals(ShadeInput *shi)
00793 {
00794     float u= shi->u, v= shi->v;
00795     float l= 1.0f+u+v;
00796 
00797     shi->flippednor = 0;
00798 
00799     /* test flip normals to viewing direction */
00800     if (!(shi->vlr->flag & R_TANGENT)) {
00801         if (dot_v3v3(shi->facenor, shi->view) < 0.0f) {
00802             negate_v3(shi->facenor);
00803             shi->flippednor= 1;
00804         }
00805     }
00806     
00807     /* calculate vertexnormals */
00808     if (shi->vlr->flag & R_SMOOTH) {
00809         float *n1= shi->n1, *n2= shi->n2, *n3= shi->n3;
00810 
00811         if (shi->flippednor) {
00812             negate_v3(n1);
00813             negate_v3(n2);
00814             negate_v3(n3);
00815         }
00816         
00817         shi->vn[0]= l*n3[0]-u*n1[0]-v*n2[0];
00818         shi->vn[1]= l*n3[1]-u*n1[1]-v*n2[1];
00819         shi->vn[2]= l*n3[2]-u*n1[2]-v*n2[2];
00820 
00821         // use unnormalized normal (closer to games)
00822         copy_v3_v3(shi->nmapnorm, shi->vn);
00823         
00824         normalize_v3(shi->vn);
00825     }
00826     else {
00827         copy_v3_v3(shi->vn, shi->facenor);
00828         copy_v3_v3(shi->nmapnorm, shi->vn);
00829     }
00830     
00831     /* used in nodes */
00832     copy_v3_v3(shi->vno, shi->vn);
00833 
00834     /* flip normals to viewing direction */
00835     if (!(shi->vlr->flag & R_TANGENT))
00836         if (dot_v3v3(shi->facenor, shi->view) < 0.0f)
00837             shade_input_flip_normals(shi);
00838 }
00839 
00840 /* XXX shi->flippednor messes up otherwise */
00841 void shade_input_set_vertex_normals(ShadeInput *shi)
00842 {
00843     float u= shi->u, v= shi->v;
00844     float l= 1.0f+u+v;
00845     
00846     /* calculate vertexnormals */
00847     if (shi->vlr->flag & R_SMOOTH) {
00848         float *n1= shi->n1, *n2= shi->n2, *n3= shi->n3;
00849         
00850         shi->vn[0]= l*n3[0]-u*n1[0]-v*n2[0];
00851         shi->vn[1]= l*n3[1]-u*n1[1]-v*n2[1];
00852         shi->vn[2]= l*n3[2]-u*n1[2]-v*n2[2];
00853         
00854         // use unnormalized normal (closer to games)
00855         copy_v3_v3(shi->nmapnorm, shi->vn);
00856         
00857         normalize_v3(shi->vn);
00858     }
00859     else {
00860         copy_v3_v3(shi->vn, shi->facenor);
00861         copy_v3_v3(shi->nmapnorm, shi->vn);
00862     }
00863     
00864     /* used in nodes */
00865     copy_v3_v3(shi->vno, shi->vn);
00866 }
00867 
00868 
00869 /* use by raytrace, sss, bake to flip into the right direction */
00870 void shade_input_flip_normals(ShadeInput *shi)
00871 {
00872     shi->facenor[0]= -shi->facenor[0];
00873     shi->facenor[1]= -shi->facenor[1];
00874     shi->facenor[2]= -shi->facenor[2];
00875 
00876     shi->vn[0]= -shi->vn[0];
00877     shi->vn[1]= -shi->vn[1];
00878     shi->vn[2]= -shi->vn[2];
00879 
00880     shi->vno[0]= -shi->vno[0];
00881     shi->vno[1]= -shi->vno[1];
00882     shi->vno[2]= -shi->vno[2];
00883 
00884     shi->nmapnorm[0] = -shi->nmapnorm[0];
00885     shi->nmapnorm[1] = -shi->nmapnorm[1];
00886     shi->nmapnorm[2] = -shi->nmapnorm[2];
00887 
00888     shi->flippednor= !shi->flippednor;
00889 }
00890 
00891 void shade_input_set_shade_texco(ShadeInput *shi)
00892 {
00893     ObjectInstanceRen *obi= shi->obi;
00894     ObjectRen *obr= shi->obr;
00895     VertRen *v1= shi->v1, *v2= shi->v2, *v3= shi->v3;
00896     float u= shi->u, v= shi->v;
00897     float l= 1.0f+u+v, dl;
00898     int mode= shi->mode;        /* or-ed result for all nodes */
00899     short texco= shi->mat->texco;
00900 
00901     /* calculate dxno */
00902     if (shi->vlr->flag & R_SMOOTH) {
00903         
00904         if (shi->osatex && (texco & (TEXCO_NORM|TEXCO_REFL)) ) {
00905             float *n1= shi->n1, *n2= shi->n2, *n3= shi->n3;
00906             
00907             dl= shi->dx_u+shi->dx_v;
00908             shi->dxno[0]= dl*n3[0]-shi->dx_u*n1[0]-shi->dx_v*n2[0];
00909             shi->dxno[1]= dl*n3[1]-shi->dx_u*n1[1]-shi->dx_v*n2[1];
00910             shi->dxno[2]= dl*n3[2]-shi->dx_u*n1[2]-shi->dx_v*n2[2];
00911             dl= shi->dy_u+shi->dy_v;
00912             shi->dyno[0]= dl*n3[0]-shi->dy_u*n1[0]-shi->dy_v*n2[0];
00913             shi->dyno[1]= dl*n3[1]-shi->dy_u*n1[1]-shi->dy_v*n2[1];
00914             shi->dyno[2]= dl*n3[2]-shi->dy_u*n1[2]-shi->dy_v*n2[2];
00915             
00916         }
00917     }
00918 
00919     /* calc tangents */
00920     if (mode & (MA_TANGENT_V|MA_NORMAP_TANG) || R.flag & R_NEED_TANGENT) {
00921         float *tangent, *s1, *s2, *s3;
00922         float tl, tu, tv;
00923 
00924         if (shi->vlr->flag & R_SMOOTH) {
00925             tl= l;
00926             tu= u;
00927             tv= v;
00928         }
00929         else {
00930             /* qdn: flat faces have tangents too,
00931              * could pick either one, using average here */
00932             tl= 1.0f/3.0f;
00933             tu= -1.0f/3.0f;
00934             tv= -1.0f/3.0f;
00935         }
00936 
00937         shi->tang[0]= shi->tang[1]= shi->tang[2]= 0.0f;
00938         shi->nmaptang[0]= shi->nmaptang[1]= shi->nmaptang[2]= 0.0f;
00939 
00940         if (mode & MA_TANGENT_V) {
00941             s1 = RE_vertren_get_tangent(obr, v1, 0);
00942             s2 = RE_vertren_get_tangent(obr, v2, 0);
00943             s3 = RE_vertren_get_tangent(obr, v3, 0);
00944 
00945             if (s1 && s2 && s3) {
00946                 shi->tang[0]= (tl*s3[0] - tu*s1[0] - tv*s2[0]);
00947                 shi->tang[1]= (tl*s3[1] - tu*s1[1] - tv*s2[1]);
00948                 shi->tang[2]= (tl*s3[2] - tu*s1[2] - tv*s2[2]);
00949 
00950                 if (obi->flag & R_TRANSFORMED)
00951                     mul_m3_v3(obi->nmat, shi->tang);
00952 
00953                 normalize_v3(shi->tang);
00954                 copy_v3_v3(shi->nmaptang, shi->tang);
00955             }
00956         }
00957 
00958         if (mode & MA_NORMAP_TANG || R.flag & R_NEED_TANGENT) {
00959             tangent= RE_vlakren_get_nmap_tangent(obr, shi->vlr, 0);
00960 
00961             if (tangent) {
00962                 int j1= shi->i1, j2= shi->i2, j3= shi->i3;
00963                 float c0[3], c1[3], c2[3];
00964 
00965                 vlr_set_uv_indices(shi->vlr, &j1, &j2, &j3);
00966 
00967                 copy_v3_v3(c0, &tangent[j1*4]);
00968                 copy_v3_v3(c1, &tangent[j2*4]);
00969                 copy_v3_v3(c2, &tangent[j3*4]);
00970 
00971                 // keeping tangents normalized at vertex level
00972                 // corresponds better to how it's done in game engines
00973                 if (obi->flag & R_TRANSFORMED) {
00974                     mul_mat3_m4_v3(obi->mat, c0); normalize_v3(c0);
00975                     mul_mat3_m4_v3(obi->mat, c1); normalize_v3(c1);
00976                     mul_mat3_m4_v3(obi->mat, c2); normalize_v3(c2);
00977                 }
00978                 
00979                 // we don't normalize the interpolated TBN tangent
00980                 // corresponds better to how it's done in game engines
00981                 shi->nmaptang[0]= (tl*c2[0] - tu*c0[0] - tv*c1[0]);
00982                 shi->nmaptang[1]= (tl*c2[1] - tu*c0[1] - tv*c1[1]);
00983                 shi->nmaptang[2]= (tl*c2[2] - tu*c0[2] - tv*c1[2]);
00984 
00985                 // the sign is the same for all 3 vertices of any
00986                 // non degenerate triangle.
00987                 shi->nmaptang[3]= tangent[j1*4+3];
00988             }
00989         }
00990     }
00991 
00992     if (mode & MA_STR_SURFDIFF) {
00993         float *surfnor= RE_vlakren_get_surfnor(obr, shi->vlr, 0);
00994 
00995         if (surfnor) {
00996             copy_v3_v3(shi->surfnor, surfnor);
00997             if (obi->flag & R_TRANSFORMED)
00998                 mul_m3_v3(obi->nmat, shi->surfnor);
00999         }
01000         else
01001             copy_v3_v3(shi->surfnor, shi->vn);
01002 
01003         shi->surfdist= 0.0f;
01004     }
01005     
01006     if (R.r.mode & R_SPEED) {
01007         float *s1, *s2, *s3;
01008         
01009         s1= RE_vertren_get_winspeed(obi, v1, 0);
01010         s2= RE_vertren_get_winspeed(obi, v2, 0);
01011         s3= RE_vertren_get_winspeed(obi, v3, 0);
01012         if (s1 && s2 && s3) {
01013             shi->winspeed[0]= (l*s3[0] - u*s1[0] - v*s2[0]);
01014             shi->winspeed[1]= (l*s3[1] - u*s1[1] - v*s2[1]);
01015             shi->winspeed[2]= (l*s3[2] - u*s1[2] - v*s2[2]);
01016             shi->winspeed[3]= (l*s3[3] - u*s1[3] - v*s2[3]);
01017         }
01018         else {
01019             shi->winspeed[0]= shi->winspeed[1]= shi->winspeed[2]= shi->winspeed[3]= 0.0f;
01020         }
01021     }
01022 
01023     /* pass option forces UV calc */
01024     if (shi->passflag & SCE_PASS_UV)
01025         texco |= (NEED_UV|TEXCO_UV);
01026     
01027     /* texture coordinates. shi->dxuv shi->dyuv have been set */
01028     if (texco & NEED_UV) {
01029         
01030         if (texco & TEXCO_ORCO) {
01031             if (v1->orco) {
01032                 float *o1, *o2, *o3;
01033                 
01034                 o1= v1->orco;
01035                 o2= v2->orco;
01036                 o3= v3->orco;
01037                 
01038                 shi->lo[0]= l*o3[0]-u*o1[0]-v*o2[0];
01039                 shi->lo[1]= l*o3[1]-u*o1[1]-v*o2[1];
01040                 shi->lo[2]= l*o3[2]-u*o1[2]-v*o2[2];
01041                 
01042                 if (shi->osatex) {
01043                     dl= shi->dx_u+shi->dx_v;
01044                     shi->dxlo[0]= dl*o3[0]-shi->dx_u*o1[0]-shi->dx_v*o2[0];
01045                     shi->dxlo[1]= dl*o3[1]-shi->dx_u*o1[1]-shi->dx_v*o2[1];
01046                     shi->dxlo[2]= dl*o3[2]-shi->dx_u*o1[2]-shi->dx_v*o2[2];
01047                     dl= shi->dy_u+shi->dy_v;
01048                     shi->dylo[0]= dl*o3[0]-shi->dy_u*o1[0]-shi->dy_v*o2[0];
01049                     shi->dylo[1]= dl*o3[1]-shi->dy_u*o1[1]-shi->dy_v*o2[1];
01050                     shi->dylo[2]= dl*o3[2]-shi->dy_u*o1[2]-shi->dy_v*o2[2];
01051                 }
01052             }
01053 
01054             copy_v3_v3(shi->duplilo, obi->dupliorco);
01055         }
01056         
01057         if (texco & TEXCO_GLOB) {
01058             copy_v3_v3(shi->gl, shi->co);
01059             mul_m4_v3(R.viewinv, shi->gl);
01060             if (shi->osatex) {
01061                 copy_v3_v3(shi->dxgl, shi->dxco);
01062                 mul_mat3_m4_v3(R.viewinv, shi->dxgl); 
01063                 copy_v3_v3(shi->dygl, shi->dyco);
01064                 mul_mat3_m4_v3(R.viewinv, shi->dygl);
01065             }
01066         }
01067         
01068         if (texco & TEXCO_STRAND) {
01069             shi->strandco= (l*v3->accum - u*v1->accum - v*v2->accum);
01070             if (shi->osatex) {
01071                 dl= shi->dx_u+shi->dx_v;
01072                 shi->dxstrand= dl*v3->accum-shi->dx_u*v1->accum-shi->dx_v*v2->accum;
01073                 dl= shi->dy_u+shi->dy_v;
01074                 shi->dystrand= dl*v3->accum-shi->dy_u*v1->accum-shi->dy_v*v2->accum;
01075             }
01076         }
01077                 
01078         if ((texco & TEXCO_UV) || (mode & (MA_VERTEXCOL|MA_VERTEXCOLP|MA_FACETEXTURE))) {
01079             VlakRen *vlr= shi->vlr;
01080             MTFace *tface;
01081             MCol *mcol;
01082             char *name;
01083             int i, j1=shi->i1, j2=shi->i2, j3=shi->i3;
01084 
01085             /* uv and vcols are not copied on split, so set them according vlr divide flag */
01086             vlr_set_uv_indices(vlr, &j1, &j2, &j3);
01087 
01088             shi->totuv= 0;
01089             shi->totcol= 0;
01090             shi->actuv= obr->actmtface;
01091             shi->actcol= obr->actmcol;
01092 
01093             if (mode & (MA_VERTEXCOL|MA_VERTEXCOLP)) {
01094                 for (i=0; (mcol=RE_vlakren_get_mcol(obr, vlr, i, &name, 0)); i++) {
01095                     ShadeInputCol *scol= &shi->col[i];
01096                     char *cp1, *cp2, *cp3;
01097                     float a[3];
01098                     
01099                     shi->totcol++;
01100                     scol->name= name;
01101 
01102                     cp1= (char *)(mcol+j1);
01103                     cp2= (char *)(mcol+j2);
01104                     cp3= (char *)(mcol+j3);
01105 
01106                     /* alpha values */
01107                     a[0] = ((float)cp1[0])/255.f;
01108                     a[1] = ((float)cp2[0])/255.f;
01109                     a[2] = ((float)cp3[0])/255.f;
01110                     scol->col[3]= l*a[2] - u*a[0] - v*a[1];
01111 
01112                     /* sample premultiplied color value */
01113                     scol->col[0]= (l*((float)cp3[3])*a[2] - u*((float)cp1[3])*a[0] - v*((float)cp2[3])*a[1])/255.f;
01114                     scol->col[1]= (l*((float)cp3[2])*a[2] - u*((float)cp1[2])*a[0] - v*((float)cp2[2])*a[1])/255.f;
01115                     scol->col[2]= (l*((float)cp3[1])*a[2] - u*((float)cp1[1])*a[0] - v*((float)cp2[1])*a[1])/255.f;
01116 
01117                     /* if not zero alpha, restore non-multiplied color */
01118                     if (scol->col[3]) {
01119                         mul_v3_fl(scol->col, 1.0f/scol->col[3]);
01120                     }
01121                 }
01122 
01123                 if (shi->totcol) {
01124                     shi->vcol[0]= shi->col[shi->actcol].col[0];
01125                     shi->vcol[1]= shi->col[shi->actcol].col[1];
01126                     shi->vcol[2]= shi->col[shi->actcol].col[2];
01127                     shi->vcol[3]= shi->col[shi->actcol].col[3];
01128                 }
01129                 else {
01130                     shi->vcol[0]= 0.0f;
01131                     shi->vcol[1]= 0.0f;
01132                     shi->vcol[2]= 0.0f;
01133                     shi->vcol[3]= 1.0f;
01134                 }
01135             }
01136 
01137             for (i=0; (tface=RE_vlakren_get_tface(obr, vlr, i, &name, 0)); i++) {
01138                 ShadeInputUV *suv= &shi->uv[i];
01139                 float *uv1, *uv2, *uv3;
01140 
01141                 shi->totuv++;
01142                 suv->name= name;
01143                 
01144                 uv1= tface->uv[j1];
01145                 uv2= tface->uv[j2];
01146                 uv3= tface->uv[j3];
01147                 
01148                 suv->uv[0]= -1.0f + 2.0f*(l*uv3[0]-u*uv1[0]-v*uv2[0]);
01149                 suv->uv[1]= -1.0f + 2.0f*(l*uv3[1]-u*uv1[1]-v*uv2[1]);
01150                 suv->uv[2]= 0.0f;   /* texture.c assumes there are 3 coords */
01151 
01152                 if (shi->osatex) {
01153                     float duv[2];
01154                     
01155                     dl= shi->dx_u+shi->dx_v;
01156                     duv[0]= shi->dx_u; 
01157                     duv[1]= shi->dx_v;
01158                     
01159                     suv->dxuv[0]= 2.0f*(dl*uv3[0]-duv[0]*uv1[0]-duv[1]*uv2[0]);
01160                     suv->dxuv[1]= 2.0f*(dl*uv3[1]-duv[0]*uv1[1]-duv[1]*uv2[1]);
01161                     
01162                     dl= shi->dy_u+shi->dy_v;
01163                     duv[0]= shi->dy_u; 
01164                     duv[1]= shi->dy_v;
01165                     
01166                     suv->dyuv[0]= 2.0f*(dl*uv3[0]-duv[0]*uv1[0]-duv[1]*uv2[0]);
01167                     suv->dyuv[1]= 2.0f*(dl*uv3[1]-duv[0]*uv1[1]-duv[1]*uv2[1]);
01168                 }
01169 
01170                 if ((mode & MA_FACETEXTURE) && i==obr->actmtface) {
01171                     if ((mode & (MA_VERTEXCOL|MA_VERTEXCOLP))==0) {
01172                         shi->vcol[0]= 1.0f;
01173                         shi->vcol[1]= 1.0f;
01174                         shi->vcol[2]= 1.0f;
01175                         shi->vcol[3]= 1.0f;
01176                     }
01177                     if (tface->tpage) {
01178                         render_realtime_texture(shi, tface->tpage);
01179                     }
01180                 }
01181 
01182 
01183             }
01184 
01185             shi->dupliuv[0]= -1.0f + 2.0f*obi->dupliuv[0];
01186             shi->dupliuv[1]= -1.0f + 2.0f*obi->dupliuv[1];
01187             shi->dupliuv[2]= 0.0f;
01188 
01189             if (shi->totuv == 0) {
01190                 ShadeInputUV *suv= &shi->uv[0];
01191 
01192                 suv->uv[0]= 2.0f*(u+.5f);
01193                 suv->uv[1]= 2.0f*(v+.5f);
01194                 suv->uv[2]= 0.0f;   /* texture.c assumes there are 3 coords */
01195                 
01196                 if (mode & MA_FACETEXTURE) {
01197                     /* no tface? set at 1.0f */
01198                     shi->vcol[0]= 1.0f;
01199                     shi->vcol[1]= 1.0f;
01200                     shi->vcol[2]= 1.0f;
01201                     shi->vcol[3]= 1.0f;
01202                 }
01203             }
01204         }
01205         
01206         if (texco & TEXCO_NORM) {
01207             shi->orn[0]= -shi->vn[0];
01208             shi->orn[1]= -shi->vn[1];
01209             shi->orn[2]= -shi->vn[2];
01210         }
01211         
01212         if (texco & TEXCO_STRESS) {
01213             float *s1, *s2, *s3;
01214             
01215             s1= RE_vertren_get_stress(obr, v1, 0);
01216             s2= RE_vertren_get_stress(obr, v2, 0);
01217             s3= RE_vertren_get_stress(obr, v3, 0);
01218             if (s1 && s2 && s3) {
01219                 shi->stress= l*s3[0] - u*s1[0] - v*s2[0];
01220                 if (shi->stress<1.0f) shi->stress-= 1.0f;
01221                 else shi->stress= (shi->stress-1.0f)/shi->stress;
01222             }
01223             else shi->stress= 0.0f;
01224         }
01225         
01226         if (texco & TEXCO_TANGENT) {
01227             if ((mode & MA_TANGENT_V)==0) {
01228                 /* just prevent surprises */
01229                 shi->tang[0]= shi->tang[1]= shi->tang[2]= 0.0f;
01230                 shi->nmaptang[0]= shi->nmaptang[1]= shi->nmaptang[2]= 0.0f;
01231             }
01232         }
01233     }
01234     
01235     /* this only avalailable for scanline renders */
01236     if (shi->depth==0) {
01237         float x= shi->xs;
01238         float y= shi->ys;
01239         
01240         if (texco & TEXCO_WINDOW) {
01241             shi->winco[0]= -1.0f + 2.0f*x/(float)R.winx;
01242             shi->winco[1]= -1.0f + 2.0f*y/(float)R.winy;
01243             shi->winco[2]= 0.0f;
01244             if (shi->osatex) {
01245                 shi->dxwin[0]= 2.0f/(float)R.winx;
01246                 shi->dywin[1]= 2.0f/(float)R.winy;
01247                 shi->dxwin[1]= shi->dxwin[2]= 0.0f;
01248                 shi->dywin[0]= shi->dywin[2]= 0.0f;
01249             }
01250         }
01251 
01252         if (texco & TEXCO_STICKY) {
01253             float *s1, *s2, *s3;
01254             
01255             s1= RE_vertren_get_sticky(obr, v1, 0);
01256             s2= RE_vertren_get_sticky(obr, v2, 0);
01257             s3= RE_vertren_get_sticky(obr, v3, 0);
01258             
01259             if (s1 && s2 && s3) {
01260                 float obwinmat[4][4], winmat[4][4], ho1[4], ho2[4], ho3[4];
01261                 float Zmulx, Zmuly;
01262                 float hox, hoy, l, dl, u, v;
01263                 float s00, s01, s10, s11, detsh;
01264                 
01265                 /* old globals, localized now */
01266                 Zmulx=  ((float)R.winx)/2.0f; Zmuly=  ((float)R.winy)/2.0f;
01267 
01268                 zbuf_make_winmat(&R, winmat);
01269                 if (shi->obi->flag & R_TRANSFORMED)
01270                     mult_m4_m4m4(obwinmat, winmat, obi->mat);
01271                 else
01272                     copy_m4_m4(obwinmat, winmat);
01273 
01274                 zbuf_render_project(obwinmat, v1->co, ho1);
01275                 zbuf_render_project(obwinmat, v2->co, ho2);
01276                 zbuf_render_project(obwinmat, v3->co, ho3);
01277                 
01278                 s00= ho3[0]/ho3[3] - ho1[0]/ho1[3];
01279                 s01= ho3[1]/ho3[3] - ho1[1]/ho1[3];
01280                 s10= ho3[0]/ho3[3] - ho2[0]/ho2[3];
01281                 s11= ho3[1]/ho3[3] - ho2[1]/ho2[3];
01282                 
01283                 detsh= s00*s11-s10*s01;
01284                 detsh= (detsh != 0.0f)? 1.0f/detsh: 0.0f;
01285                 s00*= detsh; s01*=detsh; 
01286                 s10*=detsh; s11*=detsh;
01287                 
01288                 /* recalc u and v again */
01289                 hox= x/Zmulx -1.0f;
01290                 hoy= y/Zmuly -1.0f;
01291                 u= (hox - ho3[0]/ho3[3])*s11 - (hoy - ho3[1]/ho3[3])*s10;
01292                 v= (hoy - ho3[1]/ho3[3])*s00 - (hox - ho3[0]/ho3[3])*s01;
01293                 l= 1.0f+u+v;
01294                 
01295                 shi->sticky[0]= l*s3[0]-u*s1[0]-v*s2[0];
01296                 shi->sticky[1]= l*s3[1]-u*s1[1]-v*s2[1];
01297                 shi->sticky[2]= 0.0f;
01298                 
01299                 if (shi->osatex) {
01300                     float dxuv[2], dyuv[2];
01301                     dxuv[0]=  s11/Zmulx;
01302                     dxuv[1]=  - s01/Zmulx;
01303                     dyuv[0]=  - s10/Zmuly;
01304                     dyuv[1]=  s00/Zmuly;
01305                     
01306                     dl= dxuv[0] + dxuv[1];
01307                     shi->dxsticky[0]= dl*s3[0] - dxuv[0]*s1[0] - dxuv[1]*s2[0];
01308                     shi->dxsticky[1]= dl*s3[1] - dxuv[0]*s1[1] - dxuv[1]*s2[1];
01309                     dl= dyuv[0] + dyuv[1];
01310                     shi->dysticky[0]= dl*s3[0] - dyuv[0]*s1[0] - dyuv[1]*s2[0];
01311                     shi->dysticky[1]= dl*s3[1] - dyuv[0]*s1[1] - dyuv[1]*s2[1];
01312                 }
01313             }
01314         }
01315     }
01316     /* else {
01317      * Note! For raytracing winco is not set,
01318      * important because thus means all shader input's need to have their variables set to zero
01319      * else un-initialized values are used
01320      */
01321     if (shi->do_manage) {
01322         if (mode & (MA_VERTEXCOL|MA_VERTEXCOLP|MA_FACETEXTURE)) {
01323             srgb_to_linearrgb_v3_v3(shi->vcol, shi->vcol);
01324         }
01325     }
01326     
01327 }
01328 
01329 /* ****************** ShadeSample ************************************** */
01330 
01331 /* initialize per part, not per pixel! */
01332 void shade_input_initialize(ShadeInput *shi, RenderPart *pa, RenderLayer *rl, int sample)
01333 {
01334     
01335     memset(shi, 0, sizeof(ShadeInput));
01336     
01337     shi->sample= sample;
01338     shi->thread= pa->thread;
01339     shi->do_preview= (R.r.scemode & R_MATNODE_PREVIEW) != 0;
01340     shi->do_manage= (R.r.color_mgt_flag & R_COLOR_MANAGEMENT);
01341     shi->lay= rl->lay;
01342     shi->layflag= rl->layflag;
01343     shi->passflag= rl->passflag;
01344     shi->combinedflag= ~rl->pass_xor;
01345     shi->mat_override= rl->mat_override;
01346     shi->light_override= rl->light_override;
01347 //  shi->rl= rl;
01348     /* note shi.depth==0  means first hit, not raytracing */
01349     
01350 }
01351 
01352 /* initialize per part, not per pixel! */
01353 void shade_sample_initialize(ShadeSample *ssamp, RenderPart *pa, RenderLayer *rl)
01354 {
01355     int a, tot;
01356     
01357     tot= R.osa==0?1:R.osa;
01358     
01359     for (a=0; a<tot; a++) {
01360         shade_input_initialize(&ssamp->shi[a], pa, rl, a);
01361         memset(&ssamp->shr[a], 0, sizeof(ShadeResult));
01362     }
01363     
01364     get_sample_layers(pa, rl, ssamp->rlpp);
01365 }
01366 
01367 /* Do AO or (future) GI */
01368 void shade_samples_do_AO(ShadeSample *ssamp)
01369 {
01370     if (!(R.r.mode & R_SHADOW))
01371         return;
01372     if (!(R.r.mode & R_RAYTRACE) && !(R.wrld.ao_gather_method == WO_AOGATHER_APPROX))
01373         return;
01374     
01375     if (R.wrld.mode & (WO_AMB_OCC|WO_ENV_LIGHT|WO_INDIRECT_LIGHT)) {
01376         ShadeInput *shi= &ssamp->shi[0];
01377         int sample;
01378 
01379         if (((shi->passflag & SCE_PASS_COMBINED) && (shi->combinedflag & (SCE_PASS_AO|SCE_PASS_ENVIRONMENT|SCE_PASS_INDIRECT))) ||
01380             (shi->passflag & (SCE_PASS_AO|SCE_PASS_ENVIRONMENT|SCE_PASS_INDIRECT)))
01381         {
01382             for (sample=0; sample<ssamp->tot; shi++, sample++)
01383                 if (!(shi->mode & MA_SHLESS))
01384                     ambient_occlusion(shi);     /* stores in shi->ao[] */
01385         }
01386     }
01387 }
01388 
01389 
01390 void shade_samples_fill_with_ps(ShadeSample *ssamp, PixStr *ps, int x, int y)
01391 {
01392     ShadeInput *shi;
01393     float xs, ys;
01394     
01395     ssamp->tot= 0;
01396     
01397     for (shi= ssamp->shi; ps; ps= ps->next) {
01398         shade_input_set_triangle(shi, ps->obi, ps->facenr, 1);
01399         
01400         if (shi->vlr) { /* NULL happens for env material or for 'all z' */
01401             unsigned short curmask= ps->mask;
01402             
01403             /* full osa is only set for OSA renders */
01404             if (shi->vlr->flag & R_FULL_OSA) {
01405                 short shi_cp= 0, samp;
01406                 
01407                 for (samp=0; samp<R.osa; samp++) {
01408                     if (curmask & (1<<samp)) {
01409                         /* zbuffer has this inverse corrected, ensures xs,ys are inside pixel */
01410                         xs= (float)x + R.jit[samp][0] + 0.5f;
01411                         ys= (float)y + R.jit[samp][1] + 0.5f;
01412                         
01413                         if (shi_cp)
01414                             shade_input_copy_triangle(shi, shi-1);
01415                         
01416                         shi->mask= (1<<samp);
01417 //                      shi->rl= ssamp->rlpp[samp];
01418                         shi->samplenr= R.shadowsamplenr[shi->thread]++; /* this counter is not being reset per pixel */
01419                         shade_input_set_viewco(shi, x, y, xs, ys, (float)ps->z);
01420                         shade_input_set_uv(shi);
01421                         if (shi_cp==0)
01422                             shade_input_set_normals(shi);
01423                         else  /* XXX shi->flippednor messes up otherwise */
01424                             shade_input_set_vertex_normals(shi);
01425                         
01426                         shi_cp= 1;
01427                         shi++;
01428                     }
01429                 }
01430             }
01431             else {
01432                 if (R.osa) {
01433                     short b= R.samples->centmask[curmask];
01434                     xs= (float)x + R.samples->centLut[b & 15] + 0.5f;
01435                     ys= (float)y + R.samples->centLut[b>>4] + 0.5f;
01436                 }
01437                 else {
01438                     xs= (float)x + 0.5f;
01439                     ys= (float)y + 0.5f;
01440                 }
01441 
01442                 shi->mask= curmask;
01443                 shi->samplenr= R.shadowsamplenr[shi->thread]++;
01444                 shade_input_set_viewco(shi, x, y, xs, ys, (float)ps->z);
01445                 shade_input_set_uv(shi);
01446                 shade_input_set_normals(shi);
01447                 shi++;
01448             }
01449             
01450             /* total sample amount, shi->sample is static set in initialize */
01451             if (shi!=ssamp->shi)
01452                 ssamp->tot= (shi-1)->sample + 1;
01453         }
01454     }
01455 }
01456 
01457 /* shades samples, returns true if anything happened */
01458 int shade_samples(ShadeSample *ssamp, PixStr *ps, int x, int y)
01459 {
01460     shade_samples_fill_with_ps(ssamp, ps, x, y);
01461     
01462     if (ssamp->tot) {
01463         ShadeInput *shi= ssamp->shi;
01464         ShadeResult *shr= ssamp->shr;
01465         int samp;
01466         
01467         /* if shadow or AO? */
01468         shade_samples_do_AO(ssamp);
01469         
01470         /* if shade (all shadepinputs have same passflag) */
01471         if (ssamp->shi[0].passflag & ~(SCE_PASS_Z|SCE_PASS_INDEXOB|SCE_PASS_INDEXMA)) {
01472 
01473             for (samp=0; samp<ssamp->tot; samp++, shi++, shr++) {
01474                 shade_input_set_shade_texco(shi);
01475                 shade_input_do_shade(shi, shr);
01476             }
01477         }
01478         else if (shi->passflag & SCE_PASS_Z) {
01479             for (samp=0; samp<ssamp->tot; samp++, shi++, shr++)
01480                 shr->z= -shi->co[2];
01481         }
01482         
01483         return 1;
01484     }
01485     return 0;
01486 }
